divs: Sighting Detailsmy girlfriend and i,my best friend and his girl were driving through tuolumne county when i noticed an orb in the sky.at first you could see thru it like a bubble.it looked as if something was on the dash,reflecting on the windshield,i rolled down my window & put my head out to be sure it wasnt a reflection and about that time it changed to a milky white and you could no longer see through it.all 4 of us saw it.it seemed to zero in on us at which time i became very scared and pulled my car to the side of the road,turned off the lights and engine.my heart was pounding as it moved in closer,and it hovered above us for several minutes,moved left and right at very high rates of speed,probably thousands of mph? then did what to me looked like the nucleur symbol and shot stright up and out of sight at high speed.i had never seen or heard of the orbs until i told a close friend and she had a ufo book which showed many pictures of the ones like i saw.also i saw the movie poltergeist and at first it did look like those bubbles coming down the stairway.so i have never been sure if it was extraterrestrial or spiritual.also,ironically 7 hours later my best friends girl accidentally fell to her death,she was with us of course when we saw it,so i was never sure if there was a connection there or not.i have only told a select few people ever about this for fear of ridicule,etc. but let me say that anytime i hear naysayers on t.v. trying to explain away things seen in the sky i say to myself,"this guy has obviously never saw a ufo because if he saw what i saw he would know for sure they exist,without a doubt!" i am a normal,average kinda guy,definitely not some wierdo,well educated,rational thinking person,and clearly saw this object in the sky,unobstructed. thank you for letting me tell my account,TIMOTHY W. HOELZEL,jr.
